title: Surgery in chest diseases
creator_credit: Gaumont-British Instructional, British Council and A. Reginald Dobson
brief_description: A study of a civilian Chest Surgery Centre, showing all the stages in medical treatment from early diagnosis by mass radiography to rehabilitation and final cure. A patient is diagnosed as having a cancer of the lung, and the operation for total removal of the lung is shown in detail.
